properties.title: Little Pomona
properties.address: Order online at littlepomona.com or visit Brook House Farm, Avenbury Ln, Bromyard, HR7 4LB
properties.description: Voted 2019 Cider Producer of the Year by the Hereford Times, Susanna and James Forbes are renowned for using the very best fruit and natural methods. Visit them and try their ciders in their tasting room.

properties.title: Pilton Cider
properties.description: Artisan producers at the heart of Somerset's cider-land making whole juice sparking cider by the English method of Keeving.

properties.title: FIND & FOSTER
properties.description: Working with local farmers to help breathe life back into traditional orchards on their farms; to prevent further decline and the extinction of important local apple varieties.

properties.title: Jolter Press
properties.description: ‘A bloke in a shed. Similar looking bloke in an orchard. The same bloke later on behind the bar. Autumn on autopilot. A cast of thousands.’

properties.title: Gregg’s Pit Cider & Perry
properties.address: View stockists online at greggs-pit.co.uk
properties.description: Established in 1994, Gregg’s Pit make craft cider and perry from 100% juice of vintage fruit harvested from traditional standard Herefordshire orchards.

properties.title: Butford Organics
properties.address: Order online at utfordorganics.co.uk/online-shop/ or visit Butford Organics, Butford Farm, Bowley Lane, Bodenham, Herefordshire, HR1 3LG
properties.description: Herefordshire is the home of the cider apple and perry pear, and at Butford Farm they’re continuing the tradition of quality cider and perry production.

properties.title: Once Upon a Tree
properties.description: Herefordshire cider made by a wine maker - a mixture of traditional ciders and innovative ciders using wine making principles.
